entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
